commit message:
SPV phase 1 - txhashes verification

TODO:
- wallet balance verification
- tx contents verification
- disable completely and wifi-only modes
Missing addToBloomFilter, invalidateViews
update italian translation
fix remove finishing animation when setting up PIN
fix landscape orientation mode for Nano/HW.1 login, start login on keyboard finish

Partial SPV balance verification

Doesn't verify if outputs are spendable by the user. P2SH addresses need to be
reconstructed client-side to verify that. Currently it only checks if the
sum of outputs provided by server matches the balance.

Requires server changes (confs arg for all unspent outputs, get_raw_unspent_output),
which are deployed to testnet only for now.
SPV: spendable verification
SPV: spendable verification support for 2of3
Fixed balance showing as unverified after app exit and restart
make some settings strings translatable, add some french and italian translations, fix french bitcoin.org url
Cache verified balance to avoid fetching raw unspent outputs on each startup

Fixed btc/fiat value inputs in 'Send' for different locales

Simplified formatting because it was broken with locales using ',' as decimal
separator.
New logo for GreenBits
Client-side P2SH receiving address verification
Outgoing tx verification, real fee calculation
Privkey sweeping verification
Allow sweeping non-GreenAddress private keys

Merge branch 'spv'
